com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1

Class D1Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.D1Task

  • public class D1Task
extends Object
    Main class for D1 use cases. It is recommended to initialize D1Task as soon as the application is launched or at the earliest possible time.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  D1Task.Builder
      An object that constructs D1Task from its configurations.
      static interface  D1Task.Callback<T>
      Generic callback to return result of an asynchronous call.

    • Method Detail

      • getSDKVersions

        @NonNull
public static Map<String,String> getSDKVersions()
        Returns SDK version(s) in the D1 SDK.
        Returns:
        Dictionary with SDK name as key and SDK version as value, e.g. {"NuDetect": "2.0.0"}.

      • configure

        public void configure(@NonNull
                      D1Task.Callback<Void> callback,
                      @NonNull
                      ConfigParams... configParams)
        D1 Task configurations. It is the entry point for SDK initialization. App can only initialize certain feature only to reduce waiting time. It is not mandatory to initialize all features in a single call.
        Parameters:
        callback - callback for the result
        configParams - configurations

      • login

        public void login(@NonNull
                  byte[] issuerToken,
                  @NonNull
                  D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
        Login to the D1 services using a provided token.
        Parameters:
        issuerToken - issuer token received from the bank IDP
        callback - callback for the result

      • authorize

        public void authorize(@NonNull
                      String scope,
                      @Nullable
                      String audience,
                      @NonNull
                      D1Task.Callback<byte[]> callback)
        Request authorization for an operation.
        Parameters:
        scope - allowed scope
        audience - allowed audience
        callback - callback for the result

      • getConsumerDetails

        public void getConsumerDetails(@NonNull
                               D1Task.Callback<ConsumerDetails> callback)
        Retrieve consumer details. This is the entry point for Card Operation as it will provide cardId for further operation.
        Parameters:
        callback - callback for the result

      • getCardMetadata

        public void getCardMetadata(@NonNull
                            String cardId,
                            @NonNull
                            D1Task.Callback<CardMetadata> callback)
        Retrieve basic card metadata. Use this API to retrieve last 4 PAN digit value & Card Art.
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        callback - callback for the result

      • getVirtualCard

        public void getVirtualCard(@NonNull
                           String cardId,
                           @NonNull
                           D1Task.Callback<VirtualCard> callback)
        Retrieve Virtual Card information. Use this API to retrieve Full Card Information, including Full PAN value. The values can be used for online transaction.
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        callback - callback for the result

      • updateCard

        public void updateCard(@NonNull
                       String cardId,
                       @NonNull
                       CardAction cardAction,
                       @NonNull
                       String reason,
                       @NonNull
                       D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
        Update Virtual Card state. The following CardAction can be performed:
        • Activate the card
        • Suspend the card
        • Delete the card
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        cardAction - card action to be performed: active, suspend or delete
        reason - reason for the operation
        callback - callback for the result
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isCardDigitized

        public void isCardDigitized(@NonNull
                            String cardId,
                            @NonNull
                            D1Task.Callback<Boolean> callback)
        Check if the card has been digitized or not. Use this API to determine if we need to show 'add card' button on the Application.
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        callback - callback for the result

      • addDigitalCardToOEM

        public void addDigitalCardToOEM(@NonNull
                                String cardId,
                                @NonNull
                                D1Task.Callback<Void> callback)
        Add Digital Card for a given cardId for OEM Type (Google Pay or Samsung Pay). OEM Type is set on ConfigParams.buildConfigCard(Activity, ConfigParams.OEMPayType, String) Integrator must override onActivityResult and pass the result back to SDK using handleCardResult(int, int, Intent) API
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        callback - callback for the result

      • getDigitalCardList

        public void getDigitalCardList(@NonNull
                               String cardId,
                               @NonNull
                               D1Task.Callback<List<DigitalCard>> callback)
        Retrieve Digital Card list for a given cardId.
        Parameters:
        cardId - card id received from getConsumerDetails(Callback) API
        callback - callback for the result

      • updateDigitalCard

        public void updateDigitalCard(@NonNull
                              String cardId,
                              @NonNull
                              String digitalCardRequestorId,
                              @NonNull
                              CardAction cardAction,
                              @NonNull
                              D1Task.Callback<String> callback)
        Update Digital Card status for a given Digital Card id.
        Parameters:
        cardId - Digital Card id received from getDigitalCardList(String, Callback)
        digitalCardRequestorId - Digital Card requestor id received from the bank
        cardAction - card action to be performed: active, suspend or delete
        callback - callback for the result

      • handleCardResult

        public void handleCardResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             @Nullable
                             Intent data)
        Handle data that Wallet has returned for card operation.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - requestCode available for card operation result
        resultCode - resultCode available for card operation result
        data - data available for card operation result
